member.name: T:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio
member.summary: Provides a means for using the radio feature.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Radio class.
member.exception: The radio feature is not supported.

member.name: E:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.ScanUpdated
member.summary: Occurs when the radio scanning information is updated.

member.name: E:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.ScanStopped
member.summary: Occurs when the radio scanning stops.

member.name: E:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.ScanCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when the radio scanning is completed.

member.name: E:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.Interrupted
member.summary: Occurs when the radio is interrupted.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.State
member.summary: Gets the current state of the radio.
member.exception: The radio already has been disposed.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.Frequency
member.summary: Gets or sets the radio frequency in the range of 87500 ~ 108000 kHz.
member.exception:
is less than of .
-or-
is greater than of .
The radio already has been disposed.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.SignalStrength
member.summary: Gets the current signal strength in the range of -128 ~ 128 dBm.
member.exception: The radio already has been disposed.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.IsMuted
member.summary: Gets or sets the value indicating if the radio is muted.
member.value: true if the radio is muted; otherwise, false. The default is false.
member.exception: The radio already has been disposed.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.ChannelSpacing
member.summary: Gets the channel spacing for the current region.
member.exception: The radio already has been disposed.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.Volume
member.summary: Gets or sets the radio volume level.
member.remarks: Valid volume range is from 0 to 1.0(100%), inclusive.
member.exception:
is less than zero.
-or-
is greater than 1.0.
The radio already has been disposed.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.FrequencyRange
member.summary: Gets the frequency for the region in the range of 87500 ~ 108000 kHz.
member.exception: The radio already has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.Start
member.summary: Starts the radio.
member.remarks: The radio must be in the state.
member.exception: The radio is not in the valid state.
The radio already has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.Stop
member.summary: Stops the radio.
member.remarks: The radio must be in the state.
member.exception: The radio is not in the valid state.
The radio already has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.StartScan
member.summary: Starts the radio scanning and triggers the event when the scan information is updated.
member.remarks: The radio must be in the or state.
member.exception: The radio is not in the valid state.
The radio already has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.StopScan
member.summary: Stops the radio scanning.
member.remarks: The radio must be in the state.
member.exception: The radio is not in the valid state.
The radio already has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.SeekUpAsync
member.summary: Seeks up the effective frequency of the radio.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous seeking operation. The result value is the current frequency in the range of 87500 ~ 108000 kHz. It can be -1 if the seeking operation has failed.
member.remarks: The radio must be in the state.
member.exception:
The radio is not in the valid state.
-or-
Seeking is in progress.
The radio already has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.SeekDownAsync
member.summary: Seeks down the effective frequency of the radio.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous seeking operation. The result value is the current frequency in the range of 87500 ~ 108000 kHz. It can be -1 if the seeking operation has failed.
member.remarks: The radio must be in the state.
member.exception:
The radio is not in the valid state.
-or-
Seeking is in progress.
The radio already has been disposed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the resources used by the Radio.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.Radio.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the object.
